name: Arcade Galaxy
highlight: Arcade Galaxy is a play-and-earn arcade world where players can design, play, and earn rewards.
summary:
Arcade Galaxy is the first free-to-play, play-and-earn arcade, build-and-earn mobile/web game platform on Avalanche. More than a game, it is an "arcade" where multiple game planets exist and users can build their own mini-games levels as well as compete in them with others.
Arcade Galaxy targets a wider audience than typical crypto-earning games. Combining aesthetics and intuitive gameplay with the chance to earn and own digital property, users can profit from creativity as well as skill.
